import React, { Component } from 'react'; import CrimeServices from './crimeServices'; class CrimeDetails extends Component { state = { crime: [] } async componentDidMount(){ const crime = await this.handleCrimesDetails(this.props.match.params.id); this.setState({ crime }) } handleCrimesDetails = id =>{ const crime = CrimeServices.crimeDetails(id); // this.setState({crime}); // return return crime; } render() { const { crime } = this.state; console.log(crime) return ( { crime != [] ?

CRIME DETAILS

OUTCOMES

{crime.outcomes.map(outcome => ( ) )};

{outcome.id} {outcome.category} {outcome.date_1} {outcome.person_id}

Developer: Pampanga state agricultural university ? BS. Information and technology students @2017 Credits: boostrap v4.

: null } ); } } export default CrimeDetails;
